TopicTitle: Capturing a asteroid missions, how do i get em in career mode ?

Articles.Content: I got my tracking station upgraded to see unknown objects, i got the tech to capture with the claw. But i don't see an mission to capture a asteroid. Is there such mission in career mode ? If so what am I missing ?
You might not have enough reputation to get the missions. They're some of the highest paying ones.
How do I increase my reputation ? and where do i see my reputation level ?

How do I increase my reputation ? and where do i see my reputation level ?

Your reputation is the middle resource on the space center view and the (career) resources tab in flight - it's the one with the multicoloured bar and a 5-point star. You increase it by doing contracts successfully, and you can lose it depending on strategies and if you lose Kerbals or fail/cancel contracts.
